p: Poly(dehydroabietic ethyl methacrylate-β- n-butyl acrylate-β-dehydroabietic ethyl meth-acrylate) triblock copolymer can be prepared in ATRP polymerization from butyl acrylate, dehydroabietic hydroxyethyl acrylate and diethyl meso-2,5-dibromoadipate according to Scheme 56, prior to diluting, neutralization, evaporation, precipitation and vacuum drying [ 146]. Its application is sustainable thermoplastic elastomers [ 146].
